column4: a while ago I asked about mounting a network drive (from OS X) so that it looks like a directory on ubuntu
someone helped me out but I can't for the life of me remember what the command was
something with "ftp" in it I think
the command should still be in your bash history in the terminal type "history"
lemme try but I think this is a different virtual machine
ah, do the history command on the machine you did the command on
